marker.ph: <<Window.Resources> <ui:RowIndexConverter x:Key="Rowindexconverter" /> <Style TargetType="syncfusion:GridRowHeaderCell"> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="syncfusion:GridRowHeaderCell"> <Border x:Name="PART_RowHeaderCellBorder" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="0.18"> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" TextAlignment="Center"> <TextBlock.Text> <Binding Path="RowIndex" RelativeSource="{RelativeSource TemplatedParent}" Converter="{StaticResource Rowindexconverter}" /> </TextBlock.Text> </TextBlock> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </Window.Resources> <DockPanel> <Menu <Image Source="Images/Close_red_16x.png" /> </MenuItem.Icon> </MenuItem> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="_Edit"> <MenuItem Header="_Table Manager" Click="OpenSheetManagerMenuItemClick"> <MenuItem.Icon> DockPanel.Dock="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="5,5,5,5"> <Image Source="Images/FindDown_16x.png" Width="16" Height="16" Margin="0,0,5,0" /> <syncfusion:SfTextBoxExt x:Name="SearchField" TextWrapping="Wrap" Width="225" Margin="0,0,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center" FontSize="14" Watermark="Search..." TextChanged="SearchFieldTextChanged" AutoCompleteMode="SuggestAppend" ToolTip="Search for an Item." KeyDown="SearchField_OnKeyDown" /> <Separator Margin="0,0,0,0" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5"> <Separator.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform /> <SkewTransform /> <RotateTransform Angle="90" /> <TranslateTransform /> </TransformGroup> </Separator.RenderTransform> </Separator> <syncfusion:ButtonAdv Label="New Row" x:Name="NewRowButton" SmallIcon="Images/NewKPI_16x.png" Margin="0,0,10,0" Click="NewRowOnClicked" /> <CheckBox x:Name="ResetSorts" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,10,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center" Checked="ResetSorting" Unchecked="UnResetSorting" IsChecked="True"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Image DockPanel.Dock="Left" Margin="4" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Source="Images/ResetTimelineView_16x.png" Width="16" Height="16" /> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" DockPanel.Dock="Left" Text="Default Sorting and Filtering" /> </StackPanel> </CheckBox> <CheckBox x:Name="ResetGroupsBox" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,10,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center" Checked="ResetGrouping" Unchecked="UnResetGrouping"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Image DockPanel.Dock="Left" Margin="4" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Source="Images/GroupClause_16x.png" Width="16" Height="16" /> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" DockPanel.Dock="Left" Text="Default Grouping" /> </StackPanel> </CheckBox> <CheckBox x:Name="DeleteModeCheckBox" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Click="EnterDeleteMode"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Image DockPanel.Dock="Left" Margin="4" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Source="Images/DeleteTableRow_16x.png" Width="16" Height="16" /> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" DockPanel.Dock="Left" Text="Delete Mode" /> </StackPanel> </CheckBox> <!--<CheckBox x:Name="ViewChangesTextBox" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Checked="ViewChangesTextBox_OnChecked" Unchecked="ViewChangesTextBox_OnUnChecked"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Image DockPanel.Dock="Left" Margin="4" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Source="Images/FindSymbol_16x.png" Width="16" Height="16" /> <TextBlock HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" DockPanel.Dock="Left" Text="View Changes" /> </StackPanel> </CheckBox>--> <Separator Margin="0,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" Width="30" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5"> <Separator.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform /> <SkewTransform /> <RotateTransform Angle="90" /> <TranslateTransform /> </TransformGroup> </Separator.RenderTransform> </Separator> <!--<syncfusion:ButtonAdv x:Name="RevertChanges" VerticalAlignment="Center" IsEnabled="False" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,1,0" Click="Revert_Changes" SmallIcon="Images/Undo_16x.png" Label="Revert Changes" />--> <syncfusion:ButtonAdv x:Name="RefreshAll" VerticalAlignment="Center" SmallIcon="Images/Restart_16x.png" Label="Refresh" FontSize="14" Margin="0,0,0,0" Click="RefreshAll_OnClick" /> <Grid Margin="10,0,0,0" Visibility="Hidden" x:Name="ProgressGrid"> <ProgressBar x:Name="ProgressBar" IsIndeterminate="False" Minimum="0" Maximum="100" Width="200" /> <TextBlock x:Name="ProgressTextBlock" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center"></TextBlock> </Grid> </WrapPanel> <DockPanel DockPanel.Dock="Bottom" Margin="10, 10, 10, 10"> <syncfusion:ButtonAdv DockPanel.Dock="Right" FontSize="16" x:Name="BarcodeInventoryCommit" IconHeight="0" IconWidth="0" Label="Inventory Item" ToolTip="Inventory item from a barcode to the Database." Click="BarcodeInventoryCommit_OnClick" /> <syncfusion:SfTextBoxExt AcceptsTab="True" TextWrapping="Wrap" FontSize="16" Watermark="Enter your barcode here..." DockPanel.Dock="Left" x:Name="BarcodeTextBox" Margin="0,0,10,0" ToolTip="Enter an Item Barcode here." KeyDown="BarcodeTextBox_OnKeyDown" /> </DockPanel> <syncfusion:TabControlExt ShowTabItemContextMenu="False" AllowDragDrop="False" TabScrollButtonVisibility="Auto" TabScrollStyle="Extended" DockPanel.Dock="Left" TabStripPlacement="Bottom" EnableLabelEdit="False" x:Name="MasterTabControl" /> </DockPanel>.../>

<Separator.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform /> <SkewTransform /> <RotateTransform Angle="90" /> <TranslateTransform /> </TransformGroup> </Separator.RenderTransform> </Separator> HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center"></TextBlock> </Grid>.../>
